revision.text:
{{DISPLAYTITLE:FS_Execute}}
{{WarnCompatFeature|port=[[Doom Legacy]]}} {{Special|158|int scriptnumber, side, keynum, message|Miscellaneous|Execute}} Executes a [[FraggleScript]] script. * ''scriptnumber'': Number of the script to run. * ''side'': on a two-sided linedef, determines if it can be activated from the front side. * ''keynum'': The number of the key required for activation, as defined in [[LOCKDEFS]]. * ''message'': The type of message given if the player lacks the needed key. Sides: * 0: Can be activated from both side * 1: Can only be activated from the front side Keynums: :See [[key types]] for the list of default key numbers, and [[LOCKDEFS]] to define your own. Messages: * 0: Displays a “you need X key to open this door” message * 1: Displays a “you need X key to activate this object” message ==Examples== {{noexamples}} == Conversions from linedef types == The following Doom map format types can be converted as FS_Execute: {| {{prettytable}} !Type!!Conversion!!Trigger |- |{{icon|Legacy}} 270 || FS_Execute (tag) || Player Cross, Repeatable |- |{{icon|Legacy}} 273 || FS_Execute (tag, 1) || Player Cross, Repeatable |- |{{icon|Legacy}} 274 || FS_Execute (tag) || Player Cross |- |{{icon|Legacy}} 275 || FS_Execute (tag, 1) || Player Cross |- |{{icon|Legacy}} 276 || FS_Execute (tag) || Player Use, Repeatable |- |{{icon|Legacy}} 277 || FS_Execute (tag) || Player Use |- |{{icon|Legacy}} 278 || FS_Execute (tag) || Attack Hit, Missile Cross, Repeatable |- |{{icon|Legacy}} 279 || FS_Execute (tag) || Attack Hit, Missile Cross |} {{script functions}}
